name: Snowshow
description:
This is a reupload of one of the games I have made in the past. It was also uploaded at the itch.io page of the game development club at my high school.

Unfortunately, the browser version of this game does not work as intended, so please download the game based on what computer version you have. Also the game in the PC version is called Dodgeball instead (that's what I first named it before Snowshow).

Thanks for playing my game!
